籤詩版本二:
Ubuhle obusuka kubaba buyiswa endodaneni budluliselwa kumzukulu.Ukuchuma ekudleni nasezimbathweni kuncike kuNkulunkulu kuphela.
UChunxuan ehholo ujabulisa abantu Uma belambile, besuthi, bomile futhi bozela, uChunxuan uyisingathekiso sabazali.
詩意:
Le hexagram ixhunywe nesithombe soqalo oluholela entwasahlobo.
Ngethemba ukuthi konke kuhamba kahle.
解曰: Thatha u-bamboo futhi uholele entwasahlobo. Isakazeka ngokungapheli. Umnumzane ufuna ithemba. Bonke bajabule.
籤詩故事一:
◇Inkosi uWu yaseZhou yahlala esihlalweni sobukhosi
Inkosi uWu yaseZhou yahlasela inkosi uZhou yahola amakhosana angamakhulu ayisishiyagalombili ukuyolwa nebutho lenkosi uShang.Amasosha aseChaoge (inhloko-dolobha yenkosi uShang) nawo aphendukela iNkosi uShang futhi athengisa inkosi uShang.
INkosi uZhou yazishisa eMbhoshongweni iZhaixing, futhi uMbuso WaseShang wabhujiswa.
Inkosi uWu yamukela incwadi yegolide nengcebo yegolide, okuyisihlalo sobukhosi sombusi, yabheka eningizimu, izandla zayo zigoqeke phansi, futhi yahlala yaqonda. INkosi uWu yayala ukuba impahla kaLutai isatshalaliswe, i-Star Picking Tower idilizwe, kanye nokusanhlamvu kwerayisi okugcinwe eJuqiao kwabiwe.
Khulula uJizi oboshiwe alungise ithuna likaBigan. Inkosi uWu yagibela ngasemnyango wendlu yesihlakaniphi uShang Rong yagebisa ikhanda. Hloniphani abantu abalungile nabahloniphekile, nidedele izigqila esigodlweni sangaphakathi.
Wabuye wamisa izikhali futhi wakhuthaza isiko nemfundo. Eningizimu yeNanshan, amahhashi ayaklaba futhi izinkomo ziklanywa emaphandleni ngezihlahla zamapentshisi.Kuyindawo enokuthula.
聖意: Indlu ayikho esimeni esihle (inhlanhla), ungenza izifiso zakho (inhlanhla), ufune inzuzo yemali, wenze ukuthengiselana, futhi ushade (ukuhlangana nomkhwenyana omuhle), uLiujia uphephile (zodiac uphawu), abahamba ngezinyawo bagudluza amasimu, izikelemu zinenhlanhla, izilwane eziyisithupha zonakele, kunzima ukuthola abantu (bheka), amacala omphakathi, izicukuthwane ziyanyakaza, inhlanhla ilahlekile futhi izinto ziyabonakala Izifo nezifo
古人: Inkosi uWu yaseZhou yahlala esihlalweni sobukhosi
